original_title: Odile & Yvette at the Edge of the World
overview: Two sisters, Odile (Karen Skloss) and Yvette (Heather Roheim), escape from their father during a road trip in Texas, where film was shot. Yvette promises to take Odile someplace where her wishes will come true. Through unexplained magic using mundane novelty items, Yvette prevents their father from catching them.
title: Odile & Yvette at the Edge of the World
